attributes.action: Take a strong stand against Donald Trump & his dangerous policies.
attributes.additional_details:
Some may think comparing Trump to Hitler is a bit strong but Hitler didn't start with concentration camps.
"First they came for the Socialists, and I did not speak out—
Because I was not a Socialist.
Then they came for the Trade Unionists, and I did not speak out— 
Because I was not a Trade Unionist.
Then they came for the Jews, and I did not speak out— 
Because I was not a Jew.
Then they came for me—and there was no one left to speak for me."
Martin Niemöller 
 Surely we should show some moral courage here.
attributes.background: Theresa May, Please do not appease Donald Trump. There are parallels with his government & the rise of the third reich which I am sure you must be aware of. Please stand up to this man as the long term costs may well far exceed the cost of no trade deal with the US. Remember Neville Chamberlain.
